title: Skin Shard Vanished
body: I'm not sure if I just accidentally disenchanted it or something, but I had a Karma skin shard that I rolled from 3 other shards (I think it was Sun Goddess?), and as soon as it showed up it was gone, I didn't own Karma so I thought it just unlocked the skin, so I bought Karma and no skin, I might have accidentally rerolled it but I don't think I did.

replies.body:
When you reroll a skin shard using 3 others, the resulting skin is a permanent, not a shard. Since you didn't actually own Karma at the time, the skin was still placed in your hextech loot. 

After getting that skin in your loot though, it looks like you then turned around and used Sun Goddess Karma, Defender Leona, and Pirate Ryze to reroll again and got Temple Jax.
Okay! Thanks a lot, I thought I was going crazy.
